topics.body: So I finally got around to watching the amazing spiderman; while it has problems I personally like it more than the previous trilogy.  You can actually get emotionally invested into the characters and I actually feel sad when stacy goes.  The two actually feel like a couple.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bf86356368721903cf0000#post_53bf86356368721903cf0000
Yeah but then you realize that the entire point of Gwen Stacey is dying. That's all she has ever done that was significant. And anyone who knows that won't bother developing a connection to her.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bf86a06368721903f00000#post_53bf86a06368721903f00000
I know, but she's a hell of a lot better character than Mary Jane.  Mary Jane is a mary sue.  To be honest as someone that wasn't that into spiderman and didn't know about Gwen before hand it was actually kind of sad.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: also, apparently the upgrades DO carry over to the dlc, as i am able to do the elbow smash, a last tier triad ability.
